title: 旧约 - 历代记上(1 Chronicles) - 第 18 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 历代记上(1 Chronicles) -- 第 18 章 ( 本篇共有 29 章 )

lineList.en: Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.
lineList.cn: 此后，大卫攻打非利士人，把他们治服，从他们手下夺取了迦特和属迦特的村庄。

lineList.en: And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became David's servants, and brought gifts.
lineList.cn: 又攻打摩押，摩押人就归服大卫，给他进贡。

lineList.en: And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates.
lineList.cn: 琐赐王哈大利谢（哈大利谢撒母耳下八章三节作哈大底谢）往幼发拉底河去，要坚定自己的国权，大卫就攻打他，直到哈马，

lineList.en: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: David also houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them an hundred chariots.
lineList.cn: 夺了他的战车一千，马兵七千，步兵二万，将拉战车的马砍断蹄筋，但留下一百辆车的马。

lineList.en: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
lineList.cn: 大马士革的亚兰人来帮助琐巴王哈大利谢，大卫就杀了亚兰人二万二千。

lineList.en: Then David put garrisons in Syriadamascus; and the Syrians became David's servants, and brought gifts. Thus the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
lineList.cn: 于是大卫在大马士革的亚兰地设立防营，亚兰人就归服他，给他进贡。大卫无论往哪里去，耶和华都使他得胜。

lineList.en: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 他夺了哈大利谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌带到耶路撒冷。

lineList.en: Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.
lineList.cn: 大卫又从属哈大利谢的提巴（提巴或作比他）和均二城中夺取了许多的铜。后来所罗门用此制造铜海，铜柱，和一切的铜器。

lineList.en: Now when Tou king of Hamath heard how David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah;
lineList.cn: 哈马王陀乌听见大卫杀败琐巴王哈大利谢的全军，

lineList.en: He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.
lineList.cn: 就打发他儿子哈多兰去见大卫王，问他的安，为他祝福，因为他杀败了哈大利谢，原来陀乌与哈大利谢常常争战。哈多兰带了金银铜的各样器皿来。

lineList.en: Them also king David dedicated unto the LORD, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.
lineList.cn: 大卫王将这些器皿，并从各国夺来的金银，就是从以东，摩押，亚扪，非利士，亚玛力人所夺来的，都分别为圣献给耶和华。

lineList.en: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.
lineList.cn: 洗鲁雅的儿子亚比筛在盐谷击杀了以东一万八千人。

lineList.en: And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David's servants. Thus the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
lineList.cn: 大卫在以东地设立防营，以东人就都归服他。大卫无论往哪里去，耶和华都使他得胜。

lineList.en: So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.
lineList.cn: 大卫作以色列众人的王，又向众民秉公行义。

lineList.en: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, recorder.
lineList.cn: 洗鲁雅的儿子约押作元帅。亚希律的儿子约沙法作史官。

lineList.en: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Shavsha was scribe;
lineList.cn: 亚希突的儿子撒督和亚比亚他的儿子亚希米勒作祭司长。沙威沙作书记。

lineList.en: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.
lineList.cn: 耶何耶大的儿子比拿雅统辖基利提人和比利提人。大卫的众子都在王的左右作领袖。
